message: The OpenAustralia Foundation is announcing a new web scraping platform called Morph.io. If any of you used ScraperWiki before this should be an alternative to ScraperWiki classic which is discontinued now.
story: Tarek Amr shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: Morph.io, A New Scraping Platform | Open Knowledge Foundation Egypt
caption: eg.okfn.org
description: Scraping is where you run a program to extract structured data from web pages, and web scrapers could be called the unsung heroes of data liberation.
